parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters supplied to the update variable operation.

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

Update a variable.request:
PATCH https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg/providers/Microsoft.Automation/automationAccounts/sampleAccount9/variables/sampleVariable?api-version=2015-10-31 HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-Length: 79
Content-Type: application/json
accept-language: en-US
x-ms-client-request-id: de83b5f7-5d69-4d75-a94f-a21fa4d772c5
host: management.azure.com
Connection: close

{"name":"sampleVariable","properties":{"value":"\"ComputerName3.domain.com\""}}
Update a variable.curl:
curl -X PATCH 'https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/subid/resourceGroups/rg/providers/Microsoft.Automation/automationAccounts/sampleAccount9/variables/sampleVariable?api-version=2015-10-31' \
-H 'authorization: bearer <token>' \
-H 'Content-Length: 79' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'accept-language: en-US' \
-H 'x-ms-client-request-id: de83b5f7-5d69-4d75-a94f-a21fa4d772c5' \
-d @- << EOF
{
  "name": "sampleVariable",
  "properties": {
    "value": "\"ComputerName3.domain.com\""
  }
}
EOF
